title: [BUG REPORT] Kindred ult failure.

embed.description: Died while in Kindred ult. Perhaps because I moved out of one into another? Maybe it doesn't interact with itself well?

body:
Died while in the enemy kindred ult, can only assume when I moved out of mine into hers it didn't register hers properly? I slowed it down and it still says invulnerable over my body in the frame I die :/ ..... If Kindred's ult doesn't interact well with itself then the next week when she's played a lot and all for one are gonna be hell.

(Sorry if this isn't the right place to put this, Gameplay maybe?)

replies.body: sounds about right riot ses we wont a non buggy champ then a buggy champ gets released trust riot

I hardly blame them for it, Azir was perhaps rushed too much but I hardly expect them to be perfect, especially first time round, that'd be pretty unreasonable with any game never mind one known to have some relic spaghetti code.
